attributes.action: provide better access to out of school/leisure facilities for children/adults with autism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have 2 autistic children one with Asperger's and one with severe learning/communication difficulties we find it difficult to access out of school clubs,local facilities such as swimming/sports centres and cinemas-they are just not geared for children with autism.Even holiday sites are not geared for autistic children re safety etc.Our youngest who is 4 has no sense of danger climbs everything and escapes from anywhere(he doesn't talk which makes the fear of losing him at such places high.
